ygData.subject: Re: MASK of the deciver
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually rapidly hitting 2 or 3 of your hotkeyed songs really quickly will also break the lock. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Aug 26/99, Arwen <arwen@...> wrote:

>... A warning on the mask though. If the
> illusion fails while you are singing ( it lasts approx 15 minutes before
> saying your about to look like yourself again) what ever song you were
> singing will be jammed. I have only been able to unjam it by camping or
> zoning.

Actually rapidly hitting 2 or 3 of your hotkeyed songs really quickly
will also break the lock.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
